name: The Legend of Relic
description:
Just so everyone knows, i try my hardest to keep the game updated, if something goes wrong, check the Devlogs.

Now Entering....
THE GAME!

Join Relic as he sets off in a wondrous adventure full of danger, and even Draconian friendship!
Fight countless foes with various skills as you decimate the forces of darkness.
Permanently reinforce your HP with various items that also boost your experience.
Completely easy to learn battle system that is sure to make you crave more battle and glory! Keep those enemies coming!
This game was inspired from The Legend of Zelda bit, hence the name, but i threw in my own twist.
I may make the game longer depending on request. :)
And last but not least,
i take great pride in the Music, as i have taken the dedication i have towards my Music, and applied it to this game! I hope you enjoy it as much as i have making it!
